summary: Remove redundant conditional logic in next_id() function. The original code had an unnecessary ternary expression because max(..., default=0) + 1 already handles empty lists correctly.

changes.description: Simplified next_id() from `return (max(...) + 1) if todos else 1` to `return max(...) + 1`

tests_run: uv run pytest tests/test_minimal_framework.py (all 12 tests passed)
lint_checks: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/storage.py tests/test_minimal_framework.py - All checks passed!
acceptance_criteria_met: All existing tests still pass (12/12 passed)
